meanings.definition: An ornamental molding around the wall of a room just below the ceiling.
meanings.sent1: The cornice in the living room had intricate designs carved into it.
meanings.sent2: The painter carefully painted the cornice to match the color of the walls.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to climb up the cornice and watch the room from above.
meanings.sent4: The cornice, like a decorative frame, highlighted the elegance of the room.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming through the window illuminated the cornice beautifully.

meanings.definition: A horizontal molded projection that crowns or completes a building or wall.
meanings.sent1: The cornice on top of the building added a finishing touch to its design.
meanings.sent2: The old house had a weathered cornice that showed its age.
meanings.sent3: The birds perched on the cornice, enjoying the view from above.
meanings.sent4: The cornice stood proudly like a crown on the building's facade.
meanings.sent5: The architect chose a marble cornice to give the building a grand appearance.
